short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Firefly is a quick tool to switch reading mode, supporting dark mode, eye protection mode, and easy reading.
short.zh_CN: 萤火虫是一个快速切换阅读模式的工具，支持暗色模式、护眼模式，方便进行阅读。

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Firefly is an efficient and practical tool for switching reading modes. Its emergence has addressed the issue of reading fatigue that many users experience when reading long articles. The tool aims to provide a more comfortable reading experience, dedicated to reducing the visual pressure on readers to improve reading efficiency and enjoy the pleasure of reading.

Firefly specially designs several reading modes for users to choose from. Among them, the dark mode can effectively alleviate eye fatigue when reading in low-light environments. The eye care mode is designed to reduce the harsh blue light from the screen, providing a more comfortable reading environment for you. These modes can be easily switched with one click, ensuring a smooth transition and seamless connection with almost no delay.

Firefly does not position itself merely as a reading tool; it hopes to provide more convenience to users during the reading process. In addition to switching reading modes, there are many other reading features waiting for users to explore.
long.zh_CN:
萤火虫是一个高效实用的阅读模式切换工具。它的出现，解决了许多用户阅读长篇文章时的阅读疲劳问题。该工具旨在提供更舒适的阅读体验，致力于减少阅读者的视觉压力，以提高阅读效率和享受阅读带来的乐趣。

萤火虫特别设计了几种阅读模式供用户选择。其中，暗色模式能有效地减轻在光线较暗的环境下阅读时眼睛的疲劳。护眼模式则是为了减少屏幕刺眼的蓝光，为你提供一个更为舒适的阅读环境。这些模式都可以在用户手中以一键切换的方式进行轻松切换，使得过渡流畅，无缝衔接，几乎没有任何延迟。

萤火虫不仅仅将自己定位为一个阅读工具，它希望能为用户在阅读的过程中提供更多的便利。除了阅读模式的切换，还有许多其它的阅读功能等待着用户的探索。
